snippet: Thomas Caffall opened fire on police officers after a constable tried to serve an eviction notice.
abstract: Gunman opens fire on police officers near the Texas A&M campus in College Station, Tex, killing at least two people and wounding four others after a constable tried to serve him an eviction notice; shooter, identified as Thomas Caffall, is shot by officers and dies after being taken into custody.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from College Station, and Michael Schwirtz from New York. J. David Goodman contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Thomas Caffall opened fire on police officers after a constable tried to serve an eviction notice.

headline.main: 3 Dead, Including Gunman, in Shooting Near Texas A&M
headline.print_headline: 3, Including Gunman, Are Killed in Shooting Near Texas A&M
